com.socrata.model.importer

Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.socrata.model.importer.DatasetInfo
      • com.socrata.model.importer.Dataset

  • public class Dataset
extends DatasetInfo
    The schema portions of a dataset. Anything changed in this class as opposed to it's parent class (DatasetInfo) should use a working copy.

    • Method Detail

      • getColumns

        public List<Column> getColumns()
        Gets the list of columns in this dataset.
        Returns:
        the list of columns in this dataset.

      • setColumns

        public void setColumns(List<Column> columns)
        Sets the list of columns in this dataset.
        Parameters:
        columns - the list of columns in this dataset.

      • getFlags

        public List<String> getFlags()
        Flags describing different characteristics about the dataset. These are mainly used by the system and shouldn't really be changed.
        Returns:
        list of the flags describing this dataset

      • setFlags

        public void setFlags(List<String> flags)
        Sets the flags describing this dataset. These are mainly used by the system and should not really be persisted back to the server.
        Parameters:
        flags - the flags describing this dataset.

      • setupRowIdentifierColumnByName

        public void setupRowIdentifierColumnByName(String columnName)
        Looks up a column by it's name and uses that to setup the row identifier column.
        Parameters:
        columnName - name of the column

      • setupRowIdentifierColumn

        public void setupRowIdentifierColumn(Column column)
        Sets a column to be a row identifier for this dataset. You can think of this as being the same as a primary key.
        Parameters:
        column - the column to use as the row identifier. This MUST have the field set. If null, this will clear out the row identifier so the dataset will use the system built-in primary key.

      • getRowIdentifierColumnId

        public Integer getRowIdentifierColumnId()
        Gets the ID of the row identifier column (like a primary key)
        Returns:
        the ID of the row identifier column (like a primary key)

      • lookupRowIdentifierColumn

        public Column lookupRowIdentifierColumn()
        returns the column for the row identifier column, based on the id.
        Returns:
        the column for the row identifier column, based on the id.

      • setRowIdentifierColumnId

        public void setRowIdentifierColumnId(Integer rowIdentifierColumnId)
        Sets the row identier column ID for the (like a primary key). It is important to note that when changing this to update the server, you will need to set the row identifier field in the metadata field as well. Or you can call setRowIdentifierColumn to do this for you.
        Parameters:
        rowIdentifierColumnId - the id of the row identifier column (like a primary key)
